definition: to change into/to turn into/to become
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
assimilation/anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)
catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
chemotaxis (movement of leukocytes under chemical stimulus)

sentences.english: I think that there are fairies at the miss will turn into sorrow into the rain.
sentences.chinese: 我想，定是有仙子在思念，化作憂傷成雨。

sentences.english: The dolomitization is the base of forming high quality reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 白雲石化作用是形成優質儲層的基礎。

sentences.english: It shows that the oxygenation of the sodium nitrate is obvious to cerium.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果證明，硝酸鈉對鈰的氧化作用是顯著的。

sentences.english: In addition, N2O flux was mainly derived from denitrification.
sentences.chinese: 土壤N2O的排放主要是土壤反硝化作用的結果。

sentences.english: The fraction significantly inhibited the oxidative action of O-·2 on erythrocyte.
sentences.chinese: 能明顯對抗氧自由基對紅細胞的氧化作用。

sentences.english: Lanthanide trichlorides display no catalytic effect on the hydrogenation of potassium in presence of naphthalene.
sentences.chinese: 稀土氯化物對金屬鉀的氫化反應不顯示催化作用。

sentences.english: It is a significant approach to LPG powerplants for marine application.
sentences.chinese: 爲LPG動力裝置的船用化作了很有意義的探索。

sentences.english: Grass River desolately drunk, who turned into tears of a thousand lines.
sentences.chinese: 悽悽芳草河邊醉，化作誰人淚千行。

sentences.english: The oxygen free radical scavenging activities and anti-lipoprotein oxidative effects of green tea polysaccharides were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究綠茶多糖體外清除氧自由基與抗脂蛋白氧化作用。

sentences.english: My body became all teres and my eyes wept.
sentences.chinese: 我的身體全部化作淚水從雙眼中流淌。

sentences.english: Three beauteous springs to yellow autumn turned.
sentences.chinese: 三個陽春三度化作秋天的枯黃。

sentences.english: Even if the waters of the Spring River were all tears, The flow of sadness would never end in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 即使江水都化作淚水，也流不盡，依然有愁苦在心頭。

sentences.english: Jransform intelligence into the utmost power, lnd realize huge values for the clients.
sentences.chinese: 將智慧化作至高的力量，來爲客戶實現巨大的價值。

sentences.english: The extremozymes are able to take biocatalytic effect under various extreme conditions.
sentences.chinese: 極端酶能在各種極端環境中起生物催化作用。

definition: to change into/to turn into/to become
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
to flutter/to dance in the breeze
to vanish gradually/to disappear/to fade out
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
to float in the air/swiftly/nimbly/easy and relaxed
